pkgmetadata.longdescription: Develop Hybridization Probes // Hybridization probes for target sequences can be made based on melting temperature value calculated by R package 'TmCalculator' https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=TmCalculator and methods extended from Beliveau, B. J.,(2018) doi:10.1073/pnas.1714530115, and those hybridization probes can be used to capture specific target regions in fluorescence in situ hybridization and next generation sequence experiments.
